portfolioItems.title: Aetheric Logo Identity
portfolioItems.description: A minimalist geometric mark for a high-end tech firm.
portfolioItems.fullDescription: We created a timeless mark that symbolizes connectivity and precision. The project included complete typography selection and color theory implementation.

portfolioItems.title: Eco-Summer Festival

portfolioItems.fullDescription: Captured the essence of summer through organic shapes and a neon-emerald palette. The campaign reached over 50,000 attendees.

portfolioItems.title: Slate Business Series
portfolioItems.description: A matte black card series with spot gloss finish.

portfolioItems.title: Nexus Fintech App
portfolioItems.description: Next-gen dashboard for real-time asset tracking.
